channel.title: Comments on: Question from a friend

item.description: [...] replica 2. I picked the number 4 and 2 because it’s more like a real world thing, and it is the requirement from my friend. I can test fail-over etc later [...]

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: To avoid confusion, those "4 machines" are "normal" machines, let's assume it is one 4-cores CPU, with 4G memory, and 1T SATA disk. This is roughly a powerful desktop machines, and should fall into entry level servers.
item.content:encoded: To avoid confusion, those “4 machines” are “normal” machines, let’s assume it is one 4-cores CPU, with 4G memory, and 1T SATA disk. This is roughly a powerful desktop machines, and should fall into entry level servers.
